title: Add contact email to enrollment form

requirements.summary: Display the email address athletes@velocityhealthclinic.com prominently within the EnrollmentSection form area as a clickable mailto link styled consistently with the dark/amber theme
acceptanceCriteria: The email address athletes@velocityhealthclinic.com is visibly displayed within the EnrollmentSection form area.
The email is rendered as a clickable mailto: link.
The email display is styled consistently with the existing dark/amber visual theme.
The rest of the form fields and submit button remain unchanged and functional.

file_operations.description: Add a styled callout displaying the email address athletes@velocityhealthclinic.com as a clickable mailto: link within the form area. Position it as a visible 'Or email us directly at' line near the submit button or as a styled callout below the form fields. Use existing dark/amber theme tokens from the Tailwind configuration to ensure visual consistency. Preserve all existing form fields, validation logic, submission handling, and success state.
